arStrings.szText: (PH) While {c_important}Centipede Wake{/c} is active you gain {c_number}[{SF_18}*100|%|]{/c} Life Steal. Double this amount while Channeling it.

(PH) {c_important}Centipede Wake{/c} grants {c_number}{SF_24}{/c} Vigor the first time it hits an enemy and applies {c_number}[{SF_20}*100|%x|]{/c} bonus Poisoning damage to {c_important}{u}Healthy{/u}{/c} enemies.
(PH) {c_important}Centipede Wake{/c} now slowly orbits around you for up to {c_number}{SF_21}{/c} seconds. Channeling will increase the orbit speed speed by {c_number}[{SF_27}*100|%|]{/c}.
